column5: I should be on the ice at this moment, but unforeseen circumstances keep me at home. First of all it is little bit cold outside, but this I can handle, what is worst I have cold myself. Since Saturday morning I’ve tried to cure myself with my “home made medicine”  , and it looks that it works. Today I feel  much, much better. I still won’t go ice fishing, but I do not see any reason to waste such a beautiful day.  In the dark corners of my fishing treasure chest   I’ve found some lure making supplies and decided to do something about this.  WARNING:  THIS is my first attempt (I already know what I did wrong), so you can Look at it, admire it  , copy it if you want, but only constructive criticism will be accepted :rolleyes:
Nice lures. Now you got to do the tank trial. You want those blades spinning on the slowest retrieve. Must be pretty rewarding catching fish on lures you made.
Nice job. Make sure you show us the results when you land one.
They look good, should make some for fishin buddies   ...
